feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: She bowed and looked at him: he of course was looking at her, and their eyes met with that peculiar meeting which is never arrived at by effort, but seems like a sudden divine clearance of haze.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Rosamond blushed deeply and felt a certain astonishment.

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: Rosamond could not doubt that this was the great epoch of her life.

feels.name: Anticipation
feels.quote: Rosamond, though no older than Mary, was rather used to being fallen in love with; but she, for her part, had remained indifferent and fastidiously critical towards both fresh sprig and faded bachelor.

causedByEvent.name: Imagining her future with Mr. Lydgate

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: Rosamond, though no older than Mary, was rather used to being fallen in love with; but she, for her part, had remained indifferent and fastidiously critical towards both fresh sprig and faded bachelor.

causedByEvent.name: Imagining her future with Mr. Lydgate

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: Fredâ€™s mind, on the other hand, was busy with an anxiety which even his ready hopefulness could not immediately quell.

feels.name: Bitterness
feels.quote: Such ruminations naturally produced a streak of misanthropic bitterness.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Fred felt that he made a wretched figure as a fellow who bragged about expectations from a queer old miser like Featherstone, and went to beg for certificates at his bidding.
